pages.title: Controller
pages.text: The Controller is your main interface to the Reprocessor.$(br2) Right-click on the Controller to open its graphical user interface. From there, you can turn the Reprocessor on or off, check the amounts of fluids and energy present in the machine, and monitor the status of the current reprocessing job.
If you hover over a control in the interface, a tooltip will appear, providing additional information or explanatory text for that control.$(br2)
